General.Name: Inalways
General.Description: Mediera Corporation manufactures electronic and power supply components in Taiwan. It is also involved in the medical biotechnology business. The company offers health related food products, medical equipment, indicated medication, and prescribed drugs. Mediera Corporation was founded in 1978 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 239 Datong Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 22161
